channel.title: ~~~[|ViruZ CreW Development Team!|]~~~ -[ Apply for Mod/Admin! ]-
channel.description:
[size=20pt]ViruZ CreW Development Team!![/size] [hr] [b]Server Source:[/b] [u]GangScape v5[/u]
[b]Applications Available:[/b]
[*]Coder [*]Web Client Coder [*]Client Designer [*]Forum Moderators (9 left) [*]Forum Admins (5 left) [*]Command Makers [*]Void Designers [*]Sprite Designer(s) [*]Website Friendly Image Creator
[b]Application Format:[/b] [code] [b]Job:[/b] Text Here [b]Experience:[/b] Text Here [b]Why Should I Pick You?:[/b] Text Here [b]In-Game Username:[/b] Text Here [/code]
[u]Fill out the application and post it here.[/u]
[b]Website:[/b] http://viruzcrewdev.smfforfree3.com/
[b]Current Statistics:[/b] Forum Mods: [*]skullieskull [hr] Command Makers: [*]Itzkyle [hr] JOIN TODAY!! Oh and its a brand new forum so yeah... Lol

item.title: ~~~[|ViruZ CreW Development Team!|]~~~ -[ Apply for Mod/Admin! ]-
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

[quote=“I own joo, post:43, topic:129333”]Job: Forum Admin
Experience: Have my own forum community
Why Should I Pick You?: Because I am loyal and true to my word, and trustworthy.
In-Game Username: Sitruc[/quote]
Accepted. Please join the forums…

[quote=“lasermouse0, post:45, topic:129333”]Job: forum admin
Experience: been an admin on 2 forums
Why Should I Pick You?: i read the rules and ban ppl when im soppose to
In-Game Username: mouzers[/quote]
Accepted as Forum Moderator If you read the rules well and enforce the laws of forums then you can have forum mod… AND in-game mod. Please join the forums now.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 04:50:47 PM[/size][hr][quote=“ugetpkd, post:38, topic:129333”]I might be able to make some neat sprite’s for you if you got and idea since I do got photoshop cs2.[/quote]
That would be awsome! You can join the forums now… You can be a part of my images department.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 05:52:25 PM[/size][hr][quote=“skullieskull, post:41, topic:129333”]i got ipbfree forums the pwnz good with shoutbox before ur name u got an admin thingy :)[/quote]
Yea well we might move to vBulletin… I just bought it

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

[quote=“viruz 3, post:37, topic:129333”][quote author=Fir3 Flam3 link=topic=179947.msg1648149#msg1648149 date=1186112101]
Is, umm, your website approved? Like cos people get muted for that I’m sure.
[/quote]
Oh so my website has to be apporved? It doesnt have viruses on it… Its a bulletin board…[/quote]

Well two or three people have been muted recently, two didn’t have an approved website, one was giving a free blitz pk source. And yes it does have to be approved, and it doesn’t need to be virus-free for it to be approved.
